data.title: Obituaries
data.text:
RICHFORD - Garry L. Atherton, age 75, passed away unexpectedly on Tuesday, August 13, 2024 at his home in Richford. He was born in Bakersfield to the late Everett Sr. & Doris (Reed) Atherton. Garry was a man of hard work and dedication, serving as a foreman in the construction industry t…

With heavy hearts, we announce the passing of our beloved Mom, Roberta Mae (Mosier) Martin, 82 years young, of Enosburg, who was taken from us too soon in July of 2024. Please visit awrfh.com to read Roberta’s full obituary and share your memories.

Richard S. Colburn passed away peacefully, surrounded by much of his loving family Friday, August 9th, 2024 in Burlington, VT. Calling hours will be held on Thursday August 22, 2024 from 5:00 - 8:00 p.m. at A W Rich Funeral Home - Essex Chapel. A Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated a…

Alburgh - Nicole L. Lamarche a longtime area resident and former dairy farmer passed away on Tuesday, August 6th, 2024, at the Our Lady of the Meadows in Richford. Born in St. Christine, Quebec, Quebec on June 7th, 1946, the daughter of Aurore Gevry Lamarche and the late Marcel Lamarche. Nic…

At sunset on August 7, 2024, Marjorie Leroux, a lifelong Franklin County resident, died peacefully at the St. Albans Healthcare and Rehabilitation Center. It was the kind of warm summer night that a Vermont farmer like Marjorie cherished. Marjorie was so special to her family, and whether yo…

John “Skip” Beecher Willson passed away on February 14th, 2024, after a long battle with chronic illness. The son of Fan Garrison Willson and John “Jack” Fonda Willson, John was born on October 16th, 1954, at Fanny Allen Hospital in Colchester Vt. The youngest and only brother of 3 sisters, …

Stephen Paul Boucher passed away peacefully on August 8, 2024, at the age of 80 in Mesa, Arizona. Born on January 21, 1944, in St. Albans, VT, Steve was a beloved figure in his community and among his extensive family. Steve’s early education was at St. Anne’s Academy in Swanton, VT, followe…

James Joseph Mossey, Sr., 77, of Georgia, passed away on Monday July 29, 2024 at Northwestern Medical Center in St. Albans. Visiting hours will be held at A W Rich Funeral Home - Fairfax Chapel from 4:00 - 7:00 pm on Thursday August 15, 2024. A graveside service will be held at noon on Frid…

James “Mark” Kalbfleisch, Jr. passed away unexpectedly at home on July 25th after a long battle with alcoholism that his body could no longer sustain. He leaves behind his wife, Jennifer Prinz Kalbfleisch, three cherished sons, James, Alden, and Nevan Kalbfleisch, their adoring huskies, Embe…

Swanton - Donald A. Caster, long-time area resident, passed away peacefully in his home on August 4, 2024, surrounded by his family. Born on March 2, 1945, in Montreal, Quebec, Don was the son of the late Reginald and Jean (Topp) Caster. He was 79 years old. Don married his beloved wife and …

Bill was born in Cambridge Vermont, the only son of Robert W. Fletcher and Betty (Cox) Fletcher. He was a handsome, smart, strong redhead with beautiful blue eyes and smile until the end. Although raised on a dairy farm, he said the happiest day of his life was when his father sold the milki…

Frederick Ackel, aged 89, of St. Albans, Vermont, passed away on June 16, 2024, at the University of Vermont Medical Center with his family by his side. Born on January 6, 1935, in Winooski, Vermont, he was the son of the late Joseph Charles Ackel and Mary Ackel. Fred of Lebanese/Syrian desc…

John J. Kalahan, III, 80, of Bristol, passed away at home on Monday, July 29, 2024. He was born on February 4, 1944 in Urbana, IL, son of the late John J. and Anne (Colbert) Kalahan, Jr.. John was the loving husband of Dorothy (Sedlor) Kalahan for 54 years. He served in the U.S. Air Force as…

It is with a heavy heart that we announce Gregory Michael Dunigan, 52, of St. Albans, Vermont, passed away on July 23rd after a five-year battle with cancer. With his wife, Heather, by his side, they brought forth a positive attitude and determination to live that left you humbled. Greg was …

It is with a heavy heart that we announce Gregory Michael Dunigan, 52, of St. Albans, Vermont, passed away on July 23rd after a five-year battle with cancer. With his wife, Heather, by his side, they brought forth a positive attitude and determination to live that left you humbled. Greg was …

Gene L. Corliss, 77, of Highgate, VT, passed away on July 28, 2024, in St. Albans, VT. Born June 11, 1947, in St. Albans, Gene was a beloved husband, father, grandfather, great-grandfather, and friend. For full obituary and to leave a condolence message kindly go to awrfh.com

Lou Ann Reed, age 81, passed away July 29, 2024, at her Sheldon home with her loving family by her side. Lou Ann was born in St. Albans, VT on June 25, 1943, to Gaston and Theresa (Gratton) Garceau. After high school she married the love of her life Roger and made their home in Sheldon where…

MORRISTOWN - On July 19th, 2024 the world unexpectedly lost one of its brightest lights, our beloved sister, daughter and friend, Ms. Katy Joe Tymon, age 39, passed away. Born in Burlington, Vermont and raised in Cambridge ,Vermont by her loving parents Charles Tymon and Jayne Albano, she li…

Fotini Kladakis Menemenlis, daughter of Nikitas and Andromahi Kladakis, left this world at home peacefully in Charlottesville, Virginia, on Friday, May 31, 2024, at the age of 95. Fotini was born in Piraeus, Greece, in 1928, grew up on the island of Symi and attended four years of Italian hi…

Douglas Paul White, 71, passed away peacefully at his home in Franklin on July 20th, 2024 after a long battle with cancer. Born in Montpelier on July 13th, 1953, he was the son of Paul White Sr. and the late Dorothy Bador White. He is survived by his partner, Leslie Britch, and his children:…

ENOSBURGH - Arbutus B. “Babe” Reed, age 81, passed away on Friday, July 26, 2024 surrounded by her loving family at her home in Enosburgh. She was born December 20, 1942 in Bakersfield to the late Floyd Sr. & Beulah (Foote) Jewett. Babe graduated from Naugatuck High School in Connecticut…

St. Albans - Peter Beckert, age 61, passed away peacefully on Tuesday July 23rd, 2024, at his home surrounded by his family, after a courageous battle with cancer. He was born in Kingston, NY to the late Fredrick and Patricia (Hackett) Beckert on January 30th, 1963. Peter graduated from BOCE…

On July 22, 2024, not long after her adult children had said their good-byes, Elizabeth “Bette” (Ross) Wood passed away at the age of 85 at an assisted care facility in Essex, VT. Predeceased by her husband Lynn in 2019, Bette leaves behind a legacy of love and family forged through 58 years…

Larry Richard Kempton, of Green Valley, AZ, passed away at his home surrounded by loving family on July 13th, 2024, after an 8-year battle with Multiple Systems Atrophy. Larry was born on December 4th, 1952, in Tucson, AZ, the youngest child and only son of Donald and Florence (Weidinger) Ke…

ENOSBURG FALLS - Janice E. Geraw, age 93, passed away on Sunday, July 21, 2024 at the Northwestern Medical Center in St. Albans. Born in Berkshire, Vermont on February 23, 1931, the daughter of the late Joseph and Lena (Cabana) Fleury. Janice graduated from Enosburg Falls High School in 1949…

Saint Albans - Gloria Jean (Lewis) Hayden, age 79, died on Thursday, June 6th, 2024, with her family at her side. Gloria’s family will receive family and friends on Wednesday, July 31st, 2024, from 5:00 to 7:00 PM at the Heald Funeral Home, 87 South Main Street, St. Albans with a graveside f…

Kimberly Noel Graves, 42, passed away unexpectedly on June 29, 2024, in St. Albans, Vermont. Born on December 25, 1981, in Burlington, Vermont, she was a beloved daughter to Wanda Bushey and Rodney Graves. Kim graduated from Colchester High School. Kim found joy in music, especially…

SAN DIEGO: Heather Helen Wry, 39, beloved daughter of Steve and Joan Wry, died after a brief illness on June 30, 2024. Her fiancé, Matt Decker, was with her when she passed. Heather was born in Truckee, CA on October 30, 1984. The oldest of three daughters, Heather grew up in Jeffersonville …

ENOSBURGH - Robert H. Gervais Sr., age 85, passed away on Tuesday, July 16, 2024 surrounded by his 15 children and his sweet heart of over 66 years by his side at his home in Enosburgh. He was born February 3, 1939 in Enosburgh to the late Antonio & Annetta (Martel) Gervais. Robert gradu…

Brian Preston Kelly, age 81, entered the presence of his Lord and Savior on Tuesday, July 16th, 2024 in St. Albans, Vermont after a long battle with Alzheimer’s. He was born in Allagash, Maine August 10th, 1942 to the late Luther and Arlene (Jackson) Kelly. He was raised by his loving late A…

Saint Albans - Betty Eleanor Montagne, a lifelong resident of St. Albans passed away Tuesday, May 7th, 2024, at Franklin County Rehab. A graveside service will be held on Thursday, August 1st, 2024, at 1:00PM at the St. Albans Bay Cemetery on the Lake Road, St. Albans. Pastor Preston Fuller …

Kathy Lee Bennett, a beloved mother, grandmother, wife, and educator passed away on Saturday, July 6, 2024. Born on December 27, 1953, Kathy lived a life full of love, dedication, and service to her family and community. Kathy graduated from high school in Palatine, Illinois, in 1972 and the…

Sheldon - Janet Ann Donna, a lifelong and respected community member passed away on Friday July 12, 2024, at her home surrounded by her loving family. Born in Sheldon Springs on April 1, 1935, she was the daughter of the late Kenneth B. and Beatrice (Bachand) Bushey, Sr. Janet was 89 years o…

ENOSBURG FALLS - Sharon A. Larose, age 79, passed away on Sunday, July 14, 2024 surrounded by her loving family at the Northwestern Medical Center in St. Albans. She was born November 7, 1944 in Norfolk, VA to the late William Sr. & Jeanne (Giroux) Bonnette. She graduated from the West P…

Carole Lee Sanders Jakes, age 82, passed away peacefully on Friday, July 12, 2024. She was born in St. Albans, VT, to Harold and Laura Sanders. Carole was a very prayerful person, always praying for the sick. She was a member of St. Mary’s Catholic Church in Oak Ridge. Carole was preceded i…

ST. ALBANS - Dianne Gabrielle Parent, age 69, passed away on Thursday, July 11, 2024 at the University of Vermont Medical Center in Burlington from cancer. No one was as surprised to see this free spirit get sick in May as her husband, Leonard Parent. She was born in St. Albans on March 24, …

Rosalie Teague passed away during the glorious sunrise on Sunday May 19, 2024. A service and a celebration of Rosalie’s life will be held at the Baker Sue Congregational Church in Bakersfield Vermont on Sunday July 14, at 1pm and she will be interred with her husband Raymond and other family…

Mathew Duane Whittier, 41, of Derby, VT passed away unexpectedly from recent heart complications on July 4, 2024. He was born on August 31, 1982 in Newport, VT to Duane and Teena (Ledoux) Whittier. He was pre-deceased by his wife; Elizabeth, his grandparents; Edmund and Hazel Ledoux and Gord…

ENOSBURGH - Barney C. Malone Jr., age 93, passed away on Sunday, July 7, 2024 at the McClure-Miller Respite House in Colchester. He was born in East Enosburgh on January 23, 1931 to the late Barney Sr. & Blanche (Longley) Malone. Barney was brought up on the family farm in East Bakersfie…

Alfred David St. Hilaire, better known as Fred, was a devoted husband, father, grandfather, and great grandfather who passed away on July 5, 2024, in St. Albans, Vermont. He was born on May 30, 1938, in Hinesburg, Vermont. Fred led a fulfilling life with various roles and accomplishments. Fr…

Saint Albans/Burlington - Richard B. Lavallee,90, passed away on Friday, July 5, 2024, at home after a brief illness with his wife of 60 years Dorothy at his side. A Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated on Saturday, July 13, 2024, at 11:00 AM at St. John Vianney Catholic Church, 160 H…

ST. ALBANS - Alma J. Van De Car, a life-long resident of St. Albans, VT peacefully passed away with her loving daughter, Karen by her side on June 29, 2024. Alma was born on June 17, 1943, in St. Albans, VT to Waldo G. Wells and Emma M. (Cook). She enjoyed spending time with the Wells, Cook …

Normand J. Trahan, 97, resident of Colchester, VT, passed away in his sleep on Sunday, June 30, 2024. Normand was born in Burlington, VT on May 5, 1927. On September 4, 1950, he married Dorothy (Dubie) Trahan, and they spent a wonderful 60 years together. He was able to stay in his home in C…

Saint Albans - Alma J. Van De Car, a lifelong resident of Saint Albans, passed away Saturday June 29, 2024, with her loving daughter Karen at her side. Alma’s family will receive friends on Friday July 12, 2024, from 11:30 AM to 1:00 PM at the St. Paul’s United Methodist Church, 11 Church St…

St. Albans - Nancy Wry Cioffi, 92, of St. Albans, VT, passed away peacefully on Wednesday, June 26, 2024, at her home in St. Albans with her loving family by her side. Nancy was born in St. Albans on October 23, 1931, and was the oldest child of Florence O’Heare Wry and Ernest V. Wry. She wa…

St. Albans - Nancy Wry Cioffi, 92, of St. Albans, VT, passed away peacefully on Wednesday, June 26, 2024, at her home in St. Albans with her loving family by her side. Nancy was born in St. Albans on October 23, 1931, and was the oldest child of Florence O’Heare Wry and Ernest V. Wry. She wa…

Saint Albans - Donald James Richard, age 89, passed away on Saturday, June 29, 2024, at his home after a brief illness. He was born on April 8, 1935, to the late Lucius and Louise Richard in Swanton, Vermont. He is survived by his daughter Diane (Mike) Webb, his son Daniel (Suzanne) Richard,…

BAKERSFIELD - Allan Monette, age 69, passed away on Tuesday, June 25th, 2024 surrounded by his loving family. Allan was born on September 6, 1954 to Louis and Veronica (Kelly) Monette. Allan found joy in simple pleasures, as a kid playing baseball during his school days, working on the farm,…

Saint Albans - Nancy Wry Cioffi, a lifelong resident of this area passed away peacefully in the comfort of her home on Wednesday June 26, 2024, with her family at her side. A complete obituary with service times will be announced at a later date by the Heald Funeral Home.

Georgia - Linda Jean Blake a longtime area resident passed away peacefully on June 20th, 2024, at McClure Miller Respite House, surrounded by her loving husband of 52 years, Gary Blake, and her two children, Jared and Jaime. Linda fought a courageous battle with severe Scleroderma over the p…

May 11, 1957 - June 23, 2024 SAINT ALBANS, Vt. - Richard Bascom, 67, Saint Albans, Vt., died Sunday, June 23, in University of Vermont Medical Center. Services will be at a later date. Arrangements by Elmwood-Meunier Funeral Home.

Constance Hebert Fielding passed away peacefully on Sunday June 23, 2024, at her home on Georgia Shore surrounded by her family. She lived her life to the fullest and was always ready for the opportunities life handed her. She was born Constance Gertrude Hebert to Gertrude and Armand Hebert …

SWANTON - Pauline Chadwick, age 84, passed away on Thursday, June 20th, 2024. Born on April 20, 1940, Pauline was a woman of immense compassion, kindness, and grace. Pauline cherished her time traveling with her husband Harvey, creating countless cherished memories together. She was a devo…
